entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
